_exec_summary.SummaryText:
See attachment
          Risk Management Plan (RMP) Executive Summary



The GroMoor Company (GroMoor), Memphis, Tennessee 

October 2004 Initial submission for operating a process which uses anhydrous ammonia.



GroMoor, located at 1171 Channel Avenue operates a urea manufacturing facility.



Hazard Assessment Results - Identification of Scenarios

Release scenario results were estimated using the EPA's 1999 publication of RMP Guidance

for Offsite Consequence Analysis.  The largest inventory of an RMP toxic substance is

anhydrous ammonia.



Accident History

GroMoor has an excellent record of accident prevention.  No incident has resulted in offsite

effects (deaths, injuries, significant property damage, evacuations, shelter-in-place, or

environmental damage) as defined by EPA's RMP guidelines (RMP-covered process and

RMP-covered chemicals). 



General Safety Procedures

The following list highlights the process safety plan which is in place to implement the

accident prevention program at GroMoor.  The RMP-regulated process at the facility is

subject to the OSHA Process Safety Management (PSM)  standard. 



1.   Process Description - The process description provides the following information:

     a.   How the anhydrous ammonia is unloaded into the storage tanks

     b.   Specifications on the storage tanks, including the maximum amount of

          ammonia allowed to be stored.

     c.   How the ammonia is transferred from the storage tanks to the formulation

          process.

     d.   How the inventory of the ammonia is determined.



2.   Storage and handling requirements for anhydrous ammonia

3.   Anhydrous ammonia properties

4.   Examples of injuries resulting from ammonia's unusual properties

5.   How to avoid accidents and injuries

6.   PPE requirements

7.   Emergency equipment

8.   Information on tank components (valves, gauges, etc.)

9.   Transfer steps, including a safety check list

10.  Inspection guidelines for ammonia equipm

ent

11.  Material Safety Data Sheet for ammonia
